snippet.title: Wizarre: Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Have you ever dreamed of being a powerful wizard 🧙‍♂️, going on exciting adventures 🎍, and fighting in magic battles? ⚔️

💫 Welcome to Wizarre! 💫

Wizarre is a next-gen Wizard-themed NFT blockchain game. Free to play with a built-in play-to-earn mechanism at your fingertips 🪄 

No requirements to play - anyone can join the fun!

Leverage your NFT characters and lands to level-up your skills, fight against others, and more - all while earning rewards! 💰

🧙‍♂️ Breedable NFT characters: Create the optimal Wizards team through breeding or trading.
📈 Earn & Grow: NFT Lands allow for passive income generation or adding extra powers to Wizards.
🎮 Supported Devices: Play on both your mobile 📱 and computer 🖥️ apps 

🌐 Website: https://wizarre.io
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/WizarreGame
🎮 Discord: https://discord.gg/86rzpbGcxQ
🗣 Telegram: https://t.me/WizarreGame
🔷Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WizarreGame
